		changeName (line 329)
	
 
	
	

Change a login name/display name


Change a login name/display name

	
    
				
  • return: True if update successful, otherwise exception or false Error Codes: NO_USER                Could not load the user NO_PERMISSION        This user cannot change their display name at all NO_MORE_CHANGES        The user cannot change their display name again in this time period NO_NAME                No display name (or shorter than 3 chars was given) ILLEGAL_CHARS        The display name contains illegal characters USER_NAME_EXISTS        The username already exists
    • 
				
  • author: Vadim
    • 
				
  • access: public
    • 
			

	
	

		mixed
		
			changeName
		
					(Int $member_id, string $name, [string $field = 'members_display_name'])
			

	
			
    
					
  • 
				Int
				$member_id: Member id			
    • 
					
  • 
				string
				$name: New name			
    • 
					
  • 
				string
				$field: Field to update (name or display name)			
    •
